name: WF-1000XM5 The Best Truly Wireless Noise Canceling Earbuds
description: The best truly wireless noise canceling2 headphones on the market. Astonishing sound quality with High-Resolution Audio. Sony’s best ever call quality3 with AI based noise reduction algorithm and bone conduction sensor.

items.label: BATTERY LIFE (CONTINUOUS COMMUNICATION TIME)
items.value: Max. 6 hrs (NC ON) | Max. 7 hrs (NC OFF)

items.label: General Features (Active Headphones)
items.value: Max. 8 hrs (NC ON) | Max. 12 hrs (NC OFF)

items.label: Profile
items.value: A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP, TMAP, CSIP, MCP, VCP, CCP

items.label: Frequency Response (Bluetooth® Communication)
items.value: 20–20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz sampling) | 20–40,000 Hz (LDAC 96 kHz sampling 990 kbps)
